task_summary: The robot pours the contents from a cup into a mug via precise approach, alignment, pouring, and retreat.

task_long_description.overview: The scene depicts a robotic arm holding a cup, tasked with pouring its contents into a mug positioned on a table. The robot must first locate both vessels, position the cup above and align to the mug, then execute a controlled pour, and finally retreat. The camera captures all crucial stages—perception, positioning, pouring, and disengagement.
preconditions: Mug is placed upright on the table within workspace.
stepwise_plan: Perceive and detect the cup and target mug.
Move above the mug with the held cup.
Approach and precisely align with the mug.
Tilt and pour contents from cup into mug.
Return to neutral and retreat from mug.
success_criteria: Cup above mug, proper orientation achieved.
Contents transferred from cup to mug without spillage.
failure_and_recovery: Failure to detect mug or cup: retry perception.
Pour fails or spills: abort and retreat, notify operator.
task_long_description.termination: Termination when pour is completed and the arm has retreated to a safe pose.

frame_3.now_evidence: Cup is above and closely aligned with mug, start of tilt visible.

node_specs.description: Checks if the held cup is visible to the robot sensors.
Detects and localizes the cup using vision.
Checks if the mug is visible to the robot sensors.
Detects and localizes the mug using vision.
Raises the held cup directly above the target location for pouring.
Fine approach and correction to align the cup with the mug.
Executes controlled tilting of the cup to pour contents into mug.
Retracts the arm from above the mug to a safe position.

failure_modes: Timeout on approach, pour, or retreat actions
recovery_strategy: Retry vision step if objects not seen.
Realign and re-approach on alignment failures.
Abort pour and retreat if spillage detected or timeout occurs.
assumptions: Cup is already grasped by robot at start, as per image sequence.
Instruction did not specify source; visually confirmed a cup is present and used as source, mug as target.
Amount and pour_rate unspecified; used 'normal' and amount as null. Tilt_angle set to 90° to match visual evidence.
No evidence for explicit retry steps in sequence.
